## Educational Checklist

> SQL Learn is an educational tool. Every change should help people learn MySQL.

- [ ] **Does this teach something?** (If not, why is it needed?)
- [ ] **Is there a visual/interactive element?** (For concepts)
- [ ] **Does it fit our [Vision](VISION.md)?**

---

## Testing Checklist

- [ ] App starts without errors (`python run.py`)
- [ ] Feature works as expected
- [ ] Tested on mobile/responsive
- [ ] No console errors in browser
